name: Companies that introduced new or significantly improved processes, by industry, industry proportions, and company size: 2013–15
description: Companies that introduced new or significantly improved processes, by industry, industry proportions, and company size: 2013–15

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_new_or_significantly_improved_products_or_processes_yes
variableMeasured.description: New Or Significantly Improved Products Or Processes Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_new_or_significantly_improved_products_or_processes_no
variableMeasured.description: New Or Significantly Improved Products Or Processes No

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Sum of "Yes" and "No" responses may not add to the total number of companies or, for the percentages, to 100% due to item nonresponse to some items relating to new or significantly improved products or processes.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey.
